name: mtleg-2021
description: System for tracking Montana's 2021 Legislature. A project of the Montana Free Press.

scripts.scrape:laws: (cd scrapers/openstates && docker-compose run --rm scrape mt bills --scrape)
scripts.deploy:staging: (cd app && gatsby build --prefix-paths && aws s3 sync public s3://apps.montanafreepress.org/staging-mtleg-2021 --delete)

author: Eric Dietrich
